mapper.select: SELECT uu.exp exp, (select sum(uul.income) incomeMonth from uc_uexp_log uul where uul.userId=uu.id and uul.createTime >=(SELECT DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL -DAY(CURDATE())+1 DAY)) AND uul.createTime < (SELECT DATE_ADD(CURDATE() - DAY(CURDATE()) + 1, INTERVAL 1 MONTH))) incomeMonth, (select sum(uul.outgo) outgoMonth from uc_uexp_log uul where uul.userId=uu.id and uul.createTime >=(SELECT DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL -DAY(CURDATE())+1 DAY)) AND uul.createTime < (SELECT DATE_ADD(CURDATE() - DAY(CURDATE()) + 1, INTERVAL 1 MONTH))) outgoMonth, (select sum(uul.income) incomeYear from uc_uexp_log uul where uul.userId=uu.id and uul.createTime >=(SELECT DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL DAYOFYEAR(NOW())-1 DAY)) and uul.createTime < (SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(NOW())+1,'-01-01'))) incomeYear, (select sum(uul.outgo) outgoYear from uc_uexp_log uul where uul.userId=uu.id and uul.createTime >=(SELECT DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL DAYOFYEAR(NOW())-1 DAY)) and uul.createTime < (SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(NOW())+1,'-01-01'))) outgoYear from uc_user uu where uu.id=#{userId}
